title: Extras needed for a "gangsta party scene" for Tupac Shakur movie
title_page: Extras needed for a "gangsta party scene" for Tupac Shakur movie
text:
The Tupac Shakur biopic "All Eyez On Me," filming now in Atlanta, needs extra for a "gangsta party scene" filming Tuesday.
Casting folks are seeking black and Hispanic men and women ages 18 to 40. You need to look hip and be at least 18. The scene is meant to recreate Tupac's House of Blues performance. "IT AIN'T NOTHIN' BUT A GANGSTA PARTY!!!" is how it's billed in the casting call.
The pay is $112 for 12 hours and casting folks need you to be available all day. This films in Atlanta.
Send your name, contact info, sizes and three photos to ATLHipHopFilm@gmail.com with "Pac Concert 2/2" in the subject line.
